mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.user_id, b.category, b.title, b.content, b.img_url as imgUrl, b.view_count as viewCount, b.created_at as createdAt, m.name as nickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.user_id = m.user_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_id, category, title, content, img_url) VALUES (#{userId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgUrl})
